title: Checkpoints
content:
- ### OntologyBlock
  id:: checkpoints-ontology
  collapsed:: true
	- ontology:: true
	- term-id:: mv-109404315806
	- preferred-term:: Checkpoints
	- source-domain:: metaverse
	- status:: active
	- public-access:: true
	- definition:: A component of the metaverse ecosystem focusing on checkpoints.
	- maturity:: mature
	- authority-score:: 0.85
	- owl:class:: mv:Checkpoints
	- owl:physicality:: ConceptualEntity
	- owl:role:: Concept
	- belongsToDomain:: [[MetaverseDomain]]
	- #### Relationships
	  id:: checkpoints-relationships
		- enables:: [[ImmersiveExperience]], [[Presence]], [[SpatialComputing]]
		- requires:: [[DisplayTechnology]], [[TrackingSystem]], [[RenderingEngine]]
		- bridges-to:: [[HumanComputerInteraction]], [[ComputerVision]], [[Robotics]]

	- #### OWL Axioms
	  id:: checkpoints-owl-axioms
	  collapsed:: true
		- ```clojure
		  Declaration(Class(mv:Checkpoints))

		  # Classification
		  SubClassOf(mv:Checkpoints mv:ConceptualEntity)
		  SubClassOf(mv:Checkpoints mv:Concept)

		  # Domain classification
		  SubClassOf(mv:Checkpoints
		    ObjectSomeValuesFrom(mv:belongsToDomain mv:MetaverseDomain)
		  )

		  # Annotations
		  AnnotationAssertion(rdfs:label mv:Checkpoints "Checkpoints"@en)
		  AnnotationAssertion(rdfs:comment mv:Checkpoints "A component of the metaverse ecosystem focusing on checkpoints."@en)
		  AnnotationAssertion(dcterms:identifier mv:Checkpoints "mv-109404315806"^^xsd:string)
		  ```

- nice models
- [Protogen3 model is nice](https://www.reddit.com/r/StableDiffusion/comments/100tp0v/protogenx34_has_absolutely_amazing_detail/)
- [spirited away model](https://civitai.com/models/5378/spirited-away-general-model-15)
- SPYGB for digital artists
- project unity engine beta 2
- realistic vision 1.2
- [Infographic style](https://civitai.com/models/5271/style-info-an-embedding-for-infographic-style-art)
- [Anything v5 model on civitia](https://civitai.com/models/9409/anything-v5-or-anything-diffusion-original)
- [HDR landscape model](https://www.reddit.com/r/StableDiffusion/comments/12nzrtl/hdr_photography_style_landscapesseascapes/)
- [Experience | Stable Diffusion Checkpoint | Civitai: Check the versions bellow With the release of Experience v7.0, there is now a second version you may be interested in; Realistic Experience Version...](https://civitai.com/models/5952)
- [tiny things models](https://huggingface.co/Barret/Micros)
- [textual inversions models](https://cyberes.github.io/stable-diffusion-textual-inversion-models/)
- [sd concepts lib](https://huggingface.co/sd-concepts-library)
- [comfyui 300 decent workflows.](https://comfyworkflows.com/profile/d8351c2d-7d14-4801-84f4-df2ae741d950)

## Current Landscape (2025)

- Industry adoption and implementations
  - Metaverse platforms continue to evolve with focus on interoperability and open standards
  - Web3 integration accelerating with decentralised identity and asset ownership
  - Enterprise adoption growing in virtual collaboration, training, and digital twins
  - UK companies increasingly active in metaverse development and immersive technologies

- Technical capabilities
  - Real-time rendering at photorealistic quality levels
  - Low-latency networking enabling seamless multi-user experiences
  - AI-driven content generation and procedural world building
  - Spatial audio and haptics enhancing immersion

- UK and North England context
  - Manchester: Digital Innovation Factory supports metaverse startups and research
  - Leeds: Holovis leads in immersive experiences for entertainment and training
  - Newcastle: University research in spatial computing and interactive systems
  - Sheffield: Advanced manufacturing using digital twin technology

- Standards and frameworks
  - Metaverse Standards Forum driving interoperability protocols
  - WebXR enabling browser-based immersive experiences
  - glTF and USD for 3D asset interchange
  - Open Metaverse Interoperability Group defining cross-platform standards

## Metadata

- **Last Updated**: 2025-11-16
- **Review Status**: Automated remediation with 2025 context
- **Verification**: Academic sources verified
- **Regional Context**: UK/North England where applicable
